attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having served with these guys in the Falklands(82),they have risen above and beyond the call of duty when reqd. to do so and without question!therefore i APPEAL to you as a an Ex-soldier,to recognise what these guys have done for the British Army recently and moreso in  the past!.they deserve as much recognition as us if not more!They have to do a selection before even getting accepted to the Army!They are a proud people and should be treated with the respect they HAVE EARNED!Give them what they are entitled to Mr.Brown!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
